ScriptLine.Text: Bweca marîmaraò́ pa dô̌ Khrī YeSyǔ khaucǎ
ScriptLine.Heading: true

ScriptLine.Text: Lǎrî̌hǎ nathû̌ mwaǐ takhòwèphao dò ma takarǎn katǎ khaucǎ nathû̌ mwaǐ pra thû̌kaǐ.
ScriptLine.Heading: false

ScriptLine.Text: Beǐnu hǎ nathû̌ macǔ kǎn ǔ caǔ atadaô dò nathû̌ nadeǐn takrau tayaò aò dô̌ maolǎ laǒlǎn akhau.
ScriptLine.Heading: false
